numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that generations become better when places are more developed.
2. Younger people are more optimistic than older people.
3. The youth of today develops better than the generations of the past.
4. I wonder why all countries get better in the same way.
5. I think that the development of the world is the same.
6. I wonder why some countries struggle.
9. I feel that my generation is different in a good way.
11. I think that my community grows rapidly because of the new generation.
12. The headline is: Today's Optimism runs the World.
